column3: Latest;Siem Reap: Siem Reap Provincial Health Department revealed that a PassApp driver who took the Japanese man found to have COVID-19 had  tested negative for the virus.------On the morning of March 11
column5: the Provincial Health Department revealed that the PassApp driver had been found by the Health Department for testing and the result was negative.------He is currently healthy and has no symptoms
column6: but is currently being quarantined and monitored for 14 days in the Infectious Diseases Building of Siem Reap Referral Hospital. ------SWIFT
